front.title: Support for Short-Term, Automatically-Renewed (STAR) Certificates in Automated Certificate Management Environment (ACME)

abstract.t: This memo proposes an ACME extension to enable the issuance of short- term and automatically renewed certificates. [RFC Editor: please remove before publication] While the draft is being developed, the editor's version can be found at https://github.com/yaronf/I-D/tree/master/STAR.
